means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 巴斯职业名称，桶匠，来源于中世纪英语及古法语，含义是“桶”(barrel)

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: alteration of late Middle English  bass (noun and verb), probably from French baiser, from Latin basiare

means.word_mean: 1. the act of caressing with the lips (or an instance thereof)
1. touch with the lips or press the lips (against someone's mouth or other body part) as an expression of love, greeting, etc.;
